text:
Mano, great job.
The live was really exciting!
Yeah, I watched it perfectly on the monitor here.

The school festival will
continue as planned, right?

If things keep going like this,
The three of us be able to enjoy the bonfire festival.
Mano, you must be exhausted from running non-stop, right?

Yes...
Actually, I took a short break.

But after resting a bit, I'll go back.
Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan are waiting for me.

Haha.
Still planning to keep going?

Yes. First, I'll go to the
animal petting zoo as part of the Animal Care Committee.
